overview: This 90 minute video stars 9 of America's hottest black models in a wild non-stop, iron pumping frenzy. Meet Heavy Hung Paul Hanson and his equally endowed friends, Bret Stevens & Gary Tuttle. Next meet Ray Williams work out with boyish, Bret Stevens. The two men work out with a thick black dildo. Next we proudly introduce Bob Young, a huge black stallion & his friends, Ron Davis & David Watson. This tape is a must for those who prefer dark meat.
title: Black Workout
